name: National Education and Economic Development Society (NEEDS)
briefDescription: NEEDS is a not-for-profit organization constituted by a dynamic activists with most experience working in community development programs. It started its journey in 2003 and got registered under S.R Act 1960 & We have been imparting various need & rights based services for needy such as skills and placement for marginalized youths and women, counselling, medical screening for children, women and aged, campaigns on health, education and livelihood, workshops and orientations etc., with the support of district administration, like minded and organization as well.Organization having  qualified and well experience professional team and we ensure that given programs/assignments will be initiated successfully wherever in India.
